channel.title: Cache download?
channel.description: I'm JARing my client, and it says I need to get the cache URL? I'm using Gods Corruption(317). Could someone help me out please?

item.title: Cache download?
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

This is a simple way of getting your cache link…

go to your cache folder (ACTUALLY INSIDE IT)
highlight (select all…) FILES?FOLDERS
right click go to save as archive
upload to your webhost/dropbox
get the link from your webhost/site/dropbox
go to cachedownloader class in client
add the link in that file
now you can jar…

For a more detail explanation check out this:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic
